All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, Modifier, SPFChecker, DNSServiceEnabled, LogEnabled, MacroExpandEnabled
public class ExpModifier
extends GenericModifier
implements DNSServiceEnabled, MacroExpandEnabled

This class represent the exp modifier

Field Detail

REGEX

public static final java.lang.String REGEX
ABNF: explanation = "exp" "=" domain-spec NOTE: the last +"?" has been added to support RFC4408 ERRATA for the EXP modifier. An "exp=" should not result in a perm error but should be ignored. Errata: http://www.openspf.org/RFC_4408/Errata#empty-exp

See Also:

getTxtType

public java.lang.String getTxtType(DNSService dns,
                                   java.lang.String strServer)
                            throws TempErrorException,
                                   PermErrorException
Get TXT records as a string

Parameters:
dns - The DNSService to query
strServer - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the TXT-Record
Returns:
String which reflect the TXT-Record
Throws:
PermErrorException - if more then one TXT-Record for explanation was found
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"
